data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.                                                                                                                                                           
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=AtG5QdXvSXsQ7kNvgET8jfo&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB88doD0n6nJ_sTzohhPJVV01Yo6fCSrFuXtm1lA8TdPw&oe=670BAD37)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ph8IoYModYIQ7kNvgGmG7xq&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBTU8YR7RKmzQ2poem0c70Uk-Q7LKD79y-jKBNS_NsUhQ&oe=670BBAD2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=dqBp6KnacmcQ7kNvgEW0gYp&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYANvxlYuskoJKcokGfIhaGg6eho--XpEvTIPIXAJR0P-w&oe=670BA609)
